messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How many days is it till Christmas Day
I need today’s date in order to give you an exact count.  Could you tell me what today’s date is (and, if you care about partial-day accuracy, roughly what time of day it is)?
I don't know today's date or time.

To work out the exact number of days left, I need to know what date (and ideally what time) it is right now in your location.  

If you can tell me the current date (for example “8 June 2024” or “June 8, 2024 at 3 p.m.”), I can calculate the precise number of days (and, if you like, hours/minutes) until Christmas Day.
I don't have that information. Maybe you can check the calendar or try using some tools to find out?

I’m afraid I don’t actually have a built-in “clock.”  
All of the tools available to me need a date or timestamp supplied to them before they can do any calculations. Without knowing today’s date (even roughly), I can’t work out how many days remain until 25 December.

If you’re able to find today’s date on a phone, computer, watch, or calendar and let me know (even something like “sometime in mid-June 2024”), I can immediately give you the exact or approximate number of days left.
Oh, I see, I can't find the date either.

Unfortunately I really do need at least an approximate current date in order to compute how many days remain until 25 December. If you manage to find even a rough idea of today’s date (e.g., “early July 2024,” or “around the end of September”), let me know and I can give you the corresponding number of days.
